org.bukkit.event.entity
Class EntityChangeBlockEvent

java.lang.Object
  org.bukkit.event.Event
      org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityEvent
          org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityChangeBlockEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cancellable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EntityBreakDoorEvent
public class EntityChangeBlockEvent
extends EntityEvent
implements Cancellable

Called when any Entity, excluding players, changes a block.

Deprecated. Provided as a backward compatibility before the data byte was provided, and type increased to all entities

block - the block (before the change)
to - the future material being changed to

public boolean isCancelled()
Description copied from interface: Cancellable
Gets the cancellation state of this event. A cancelled event will not be executed in the server, but will still pass to other plugins

Specified by:

Returns:
true if this event is cancelled
